ing: 1/2 teaspoon apple pie spice, or to taste
4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cooked and diced
des: "This is a recipe I discovered by accident. While trying to make the Betty CrockerÂ® chicken salad, I discovered I didn't have all the spices. '...quick, what can I substitute...'  This has been a family favorite ever since."
ins: In a bowl, lightly mix the apple, grapes, pecans, apple pie spice, and mayonnaise together until thoroughly combined; stir in the chicken breast meat. Chill until cold.
